data.message: Codex review of Phase 2.2 Adversarial Testing plan: Used gpt-5.3-codex (113K tokens) to analyze .agent codebase. Added 19 specific test scenarios with file references across 4 categories: Data Integrity, Concurrency, Embedding Failures, Recovery. Identified high-priority gaps: dedup collision, reembed/prune race, model drift. Saved to phase-2.2-adversarial-testing-planify.md
